description.para: This boolean parameter controls whether smbd 8 will attempt to map the 'inherit' and 'protected' access control entry flags stored in Windows ACLs into an extended attribute called user.SAMBA_PAI (POSIX ACL Inheritance). This parameter requires supports for extended attributes on the filesystem and allows the Windows ACL editor to store inheritance information while NT ACLs are mapped best-effort to the POSIX ACLs.
